summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for buidlguidl/ens-pg in April 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented a new approval flow for both ETH and USDC grants, requiring two approvals for finalization.
  - Added a rejection system for USDC grants, necessitating two rejections before a grant or stage can be denied.
  - Enhanced milestone management by allowing builders to complete USDC grant milestones and filling the `completed_at` field automatically.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved issues with the milestone flow when an admin rejects after one approval, ensuring correct status updates.
  - Fixed visual inconsistencies in the admin interface, including the display of milestone purple dots and button styles.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - A focus on improving the user experience for grant approvals and milestone management.
  - Significant attention to visual and functional bugs within the admin interface, enhancing usability and clarity.

topIssues.title: Pre-fill completion proof when resubmitting a milestone
New approval flow for ETH grants
New approval flow for USDC grants
Fix milestone flow when an admin rejects after one approval
When grantee "Complete" a milestone on their large grant detail page, we should fill `completed_at` field

topPRs.title: Fix milestone flow when an admin rejects after one approval
Fill milestone completedAt field when completing a milestone
Remove link to builder submissions on new stage proposals
Fix purple dot on admin cards header for long texts
